FlowSkeleton

Class Water

  • java.lang.Object
    • FlowSkeleton.Water

  • public class Water
extends java.lang.Object
    Water class to represant water depths at different points in the terrain.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Water(int dimx, int dimy)
      Contructor to initialize water data and set every depth to zero.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears water by setting all the depths to 0; and creating a new water array.

      • conserved

        public boolean conserved()
        Tester function to test if the water was conserved or not. Should be used at the end of the simulation as a check for correctness.
        Returns:
        boolean indication for water conservation.
